front.title: Extra Extended DNS Error codes for DNSSEC status bogus

abstract.t: While implementing Extended DNS Errors in our DNSSEC validating resolver software Unbound, we encountered these specific situations regarding the DNSSEC bogus status where no Extended DNS Error were yet defined. This draft serves as a reference for the request of Extended DNS Error Codes in the IANA registry.

section.name: Introduction
section.t: While implementing Extended DNS Errors in our DNSSEC validating resolver software Unbound , we encountered these specific situations regarding the DNSSEC bogus status where no Extended DNS Error were yet defined. This draft serves as a reference for the request of Extended DNS Error Codes in the IANA registry.

section.name: Extended DNS Error Code TBD - Signature Wrong Size
section.t: The resolver attempted to perform DNSSEC validation, but the signature is either smaller or larger than expected for the specified algorithm.

section.name: Extended DNS Error Code TBD - Malformed Signer Name
section.t: The resolver attempted to perform DNSSEC validation, but the Signer's Name Field in the signature contains a malformed signer (d)name.

section.name: Extended DNS Error Code TBD - Signer Name Out of zone
section.t: The resolver attempted to perform DNSSEC validation, but the Signer's Name Field in the signature does not contain the zone name of the covered RRset.

section.name: Extended DNS Error Code TBD - Signature Label Count Wrong
section.t: The resolver attempted to perform DNSSEC validation, but the number of labels in the Signature Labels Field is incorrect.

section.name: Extended DNS Error Code TBD - DNSSEC Insufficient NSEC Proof
section.t: The resolver attempted to perform DNSSEC validation, but the signed response does not have valid NSEC proof.

section.name: Extended DNS Error Code TBD - DNSSEC Unknown Protocol
section.t: The resolver attempted to perform DNSSEC validation, but found a value not equal to 3 in the DNSKEY protocol number field as specified by RFC4034#section-2.1.2.

section.name: Security Considerations
section.t: As this draft only seeks to add code points to the EDE registry, the security considerations are the same as in .

section.name: IANA Considerations
section.t: This draft requests the assignment of a new EDE code values for the specified EDE codes.

abstract.t: This document defines an extensible method to return additional information about the cause of DNS errors. Though created primarily to extend SERVFAIL to provide additional information about the cause of DNS and DNSSEC failures, the Extended DNS Errors option defined in this document allows all response types to contain extended error information. Extended DNS Error information does not change the processing of RCODEs.

This RFC provides a description of the DCN protocols for maintaining connectivity, routing, and clock information in a local network. These procedures may be of interest to the designers and implementers of other local networks.
